body:
**What happened**:
Data race in tests in an unrelated PR https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/64654
Logs https://k8s-gubernator.appspot.com/build/kubernetes-jenkins/pr-logs/pull/64654/pull-kubernetes-bazel-test/51222/
```
Executing tests from //pkg/cloudprovider/providers/vsphere:go_default_test
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
E0702 06:51:23.931693      15 credentialmanager.go:91] Cannot get secret vsconf in namespace kube-system. error: "secret \"vsconf\" not found"
E0702 06:51:24.113654      15 credentialmanager.go:91] Cannot get secret vsconf in namespace kube-system. error: "secret \"vsconf\" not found"
E0702 06:51:24.115151      15 credentialmanager.go:79] credentials not found for server "0.0.0.0"
E0702 06:51:24.115838      15 credentialmanager.go:79] credentials not found for server "1.1.1.1"
E0702 06:51:24.116971      15 credentialmanager.go:153] Unknown secret key 10.20.30.40.usernam
E0702 06:51:24.117098      15 credentialmanager.go:159] Username/Password is missing for server 10.20.30.40
E0702 06:51:24.117189      15 credentialmanager.go:159] Username/Password is missing for server 10.20.30.40
E0702 06:51:24.117270      15 credentialmanager.go:153] Unknown secret key 10.20.30.40
E0702 06:51:24.192449      15 connection.go:142] No active session, cannot logout
E0702 06:51:24.260716      15 connection.go:142] No active session, cannot logout
E0702 06:51:24.366640      15 connection.go:142] No active session, cannot logout
==================
WARNING: DATA RACE
Write at 0x00c42013d100 by goroutine 80:
  k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/cloudprovider/providers/vsphere/vclib.(*VSphereConnection).Connect()
      pkg/cloudprovider/providers/vsphere/vclib/connection.go:61 +0x3ff
  k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/cloudprovider/providers/vsphere.TestVSphereLoginWithCaCert()
      pkg/cloudprovider/providers/vsphere/vsphere_test.go:310 +0x717
  testing.tRunner()
      GOROOT/src/testing/testing.go:777 +0x16d

Previous read at 0x00c42013d100 by goroutine 5:
  k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/cloudprovider/providers/vsphere.logout()
      pkg/cloudprovider/providers/vsphere/vsphere.go:513 +0x10b

Goroutine 80 (running) created at:
  testing.(*T).Run()
      GOROOT/src/testing/testing.go:824 +0x564
  testing.runTests.func1()
      GOROOT/src/testing/testing.go:1063 +0xa4
  testing.tRunner()
      GOROOT/src/testing/testing.go:777 +0x16d
  testing.runTests()
      GOROOT/src/testing/testing.go:1061 +0x4e1
  testing.(*M).Run()
      GOROOT/src/testing/testing.go:978 +0x2cd
  main.main()
      bazel-out/k8-fastbuild/bin/pkg/cloudprovider/providers/vsphere/linux_amd64_race_stripped/go_default_test~/testmain.go:89 +0x28e

Goroutine 5 (running) created at:
  runtime.createfing()
      GOROOT/src/runtime/mfinal.go:156 +0x61
  os.NewFile()
      GOROOT/src/os/file_unix.go:79 +0x55
  os.init()
      GOROOT/src/os/file.go:58 +0x418
  fmt.init()
      <autogenerated>:1 +0xa0
  flag.init()
      <autogenerated>:1 +0x96
  main.init()
      <autogenerated>:1 +0x96
==================
E0702 06:51:24.637923      15 connection.go:142] No active session, cannot logout
--- FAIL: TestVSphereLoginWithCaCert (0.27s)
	testing.go:730: race detected during execution of test
E0702 06:51:24.646383      15 vsphere.go:312] Global.User is empty!
E0702 06:51:24.647262      15 vsphere.go:316] Global.Password is empty!
E0702 06:51:24.648055      15 vsphere.go:312] Global.User is empty!
FAIL
```

/kind bug
/area platform/vsphere 
/area cloudprovider
/sig cloud-provider

title: Data race in TestVSphereLoginWithCaCert
